Subject: Life Hacks: Communication
Description: Flame wars got you down? This panel will cover hacks for improving interpersonal communication.  Topics include: active listening, nonviolent communication, conflict resolution, consensus decision-making, validation, and common pitfalls and fallacies.  Speakers include:Ed Platt - Track: Life  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Civic Technology
Description: From SMS-based blogging platforms, to visualization of large-scale public data, to Android tablets for prison inmates reconnecting with society, the way we interact with each other, our communities, and our governments is changing.  This panel will present some exciting examples and speculate on future possibilities.  Speakers include:Ed Platt, Shaka Sengho - Track: Tech  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector

Subject: Advanced Napping: In Public, At Work, Even Instead of Sleep
Description: The science is pretty unanimous:  Naps help improve concentration, energy, mood, and may be linked to other health and lifestyle benefits too.  But how, in the real world, can you really get the naps you want?  Long-term polyphasic sleeper and author Marie Staver (aka PureDoxyk) will give tips and answer questions about napping in public, negotiating naptime at work, prioritizing naps, and teaching yourself to fall asleep quickly and wake rested.   Speakers include:Marie Staver, Ed Platt, Neil Funk - Track: Life  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Data Visualization with d3.js
Description: See examples of interactive data visualizations built with d3.js and learn how to make your own.  Speakers include:Ed Platt - Track: Tech  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector

Subject: Open Source Jobs
Description: Love free and open source software?  Want to find a way to get paid to work on it?  Our panelists have found a way to do it, come find out how you can too!  Speakers include:Ed Platt, Jorge Castro, Eric Merrill, Matt Switlik - Track: Tech  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
